mapper.select:
SELECT id, title, type FROM sys_notice WHERE ( effective_time IS NULL OR NOW() > effective_time ) AND ( terminate_time IS NULL OR terminate_time > NOW())
AND ( notice_scope = 1 OR ( notice_scope = 2 AND
JSON_EXTRACT(notice_users, "$[0]") = CAST(#{userId} AS CHAR) ))
ORDER BY sort ASC, effective_time DESC LIMIT 5;
